name: Paint Rush
description:
Welcome in Paint Rush.

In this homage to good ol' arcade games, you'll start with nothing, and will struggle understanding where you stand or where to go.
Crush devilish ennemies against grounds and doors to paint your way through the game, and understand the contours of this world that seems hidden to your eyes!
Jump, climb walls, hit and explode your opponents with powerful finish moves to stay alive until the end. Be brave, warriors!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pad Controls :
Move : Left Stick
Jump : A
Hit : X
Grab : Y
Orient finish : Left Stick
Finish Move : X/Y

Keyboard Controls :
Move : Q/D
Jump : SPACE
Hit : Mouse Left Click
Grab : Mouse Right Click
Orient finish move : Mouse Cursor
Finish Move : Left or Right Click

This game is brought to you by: 
Louis Denizet (@louis.denizet) - Game Design/Code
Romain Rope (@RomainRope) - Sound Design/Music/Pixel Art support
Mathieu Clavel (@EkilibrMc) - Game Design/Concept Art
Alexandre Magnat (@Skreed3) - Pixel Art/Animation
